text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
This obsoletes IRM 6.500.1, Pay Administration, dated September 19, 2013.

The material previously contained in IRM 6.500.1, Pay Administration, dated September 19, 2013, specifically sections 6.500.1.15 through IRM 6.500.1.17, is incorporated into the new IRM 6.575.1, IRS Recruitment, Relocation, Retention, and Extended Assignment Incentives, dated September
